definition: to bless and protect/blessing
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to assist/to protect

sentences.english: May God bless the grieving families, and may God continue to bless America.
sentences.chinese: 願神保佑他們悲慟的家人，願神繼續保佑美國。

sentences.english: May God bless the grieving families, and may God continue to bless America.
sentences.chinese: 願神保佑他們悲慟的家人，願神繼續保佑美國。

sentences.english: Bless her from marrying a miser.
sentences.chinese: 上天保佑她不要嫁給一個吝嗇鬼。

sentences.english: If you commit your finances to God it will probably mean cutting back on your spending.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想讓上帝保佑你財運亨通，那你就得節省開支。

sentences.english: Buddha Bodhisattva only bless people willing to help themselves.
sentences.chinese: 佛菩薩只保佑那些肯幫助自己的人。

sentences.english: I am more sure now he is watching over us since the electric incident.
sentences.chinese: 我更相信他現在是保佑着我們，因爲電閘事件。

sentences.english: God bless all, from Star Makar .
sentences.chinese: 上帝保佑一切，從星光馬卡。

sentences.english: So may God bless those brave men and women in uniform who are away from their families this holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 請上帝保佑這些在佳節之際仍遠在他鄉的英勇士兵們。

sentences.english: Dad didn't give me any information. i don't kown how to do . God bless me OK?
sentences.chinese: 爸爸一直都沒消息。不知道怎麼辦？神保佑我好嗎？

sentences.english: God bless you. And may God bless the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 天主保佑你們，怨亓保佑美利堅合衆國。

sentences.english: God bless you. And may God bless the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 天主保佑你們，怨亓保佑美利堅合衆國。
梵天給予了他這一神靈保佑。

sentences.english: God bless all, from Star Makar.
Endue him with blessings, and send him your peace.
God blesses you and your family.
sentences.chinese: 求主保佑你和你的家人。

sentences.english: She smiled, blessed me and carried on with her round.
sentences.chinese: 她笑了，祈福保佑我，然後去繼續查房了。

definition: to bless/to protect/protection (esp. divine)
to bless and protect/to protect
blessing
to pray for/to appeal
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
to pray/to say one's prayers/prayer
to bless
to care for/to show concern for/to think longingly (of one's country)
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
amen (loanword)
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
to pray for blessings
